segments.text: This skirt is too tight . I would like to return it please . Do I need to go to the customer's service desk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can help you with that . Do you still have your receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I receive this as a birthday present , but the price tag is still on the skirt though . Will that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , that will help me a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any more skirts in this style ? I would like to find a size larger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I think we're out of this skirt in this color . Do you want me to call another one of our store to see if it's available there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that's all right . I'll just look for something else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , your refund total is 50 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
